q1.question: How long does the residency process take?
q1.answer: The Qualified Investor Visa process typically takes 3-4 months from application to approval, assuming all documentation is complete.

q2.question: What is the minimum investment required?
q2.answer: The minimum investment ranges from $300,000 for real estate to $700,000 for bank deposits, depending on your chosen investment option.

q3.question: Can I include my family in the application?
q3.answer: Yes, you can include your spouse, dependent children under 25, and dependent parents in your residency application.

q4.question: Do I need to live in Panama full-time?
q4.answer: No, the Qualified Investor Visa has no minimum stay requirements, allowing you to maintain your current residence while enjoying Panama residency benefits.
